text: Which of the following best describes what a computer program is?
options: A series of files on your computer
A list of steps that tell a computer what to do
A digital version of a TV programme
A mysterious force that controls the cloud

text: What is the main purpose of using a loop in a program?
options: To repeat a task multiple times

text: What does “debugging” a program mean?
options: Finding and fixing mistakes in the program
Resetting the computer to factory settings

text: Which of these best explains what an “if statement” does in programming?
options: It allows the program to make a decision
It deletes files that aren’t needed

text: Why do programmers often use comments in their code?
options: To leave helpful notes or explanations

text: A farmer has 17 sheep. All but 9 run away. How many does he have left?
options: Depends if he’s using AWS or Azure

text: Which statement is always true?
options: Every odd number is divisible by 3
If today is Monday, then tomorrow is Tuesday
All software bugs are caused by hardware

text: If a train leaves Edinburgh at 9:00 AM heading south at 80 km/h, and another leaves London at 10:00 AM heading north at 100 km/h, where do they meet?
Which of these patterns continues correctly? 2, 4, 8, 16, ?
What is the next number in this series: 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, ?
Which company makes the M2 chip?
What is Docker most commonly used for?
Which of the following is *not* a web browser?
Which is faster at crunching large AI models today (2025)?
Which of these is *most likely* a front-end web framework?
What does “CI/CD” stand for?
Why is DevOps important in modern software delivery?
options: It helps marketing write better copy
It improves collaboration and speeds up deployments

text: Which of these is a popular DevOps tool?
What is “infrastructure as code”?
options: Writing code that builds and manages servers and systems
Using code to control website colours

text: Which of these best describes a “pipeline” in DevOps?
options: A sequence of automated steps from coding to deployment
A connection between GitHub and Instagram
A duct under the server room

text: What is the purpose of a P&L statement?
options: To rank programmers by caffeine use
To summarise a business’s income and expenses
To help your cat file taxes

text: Which of these is a legal business structure in the UK?
Which metric best reflects profitability?
In a startup, what is “runway”?
What is the primary goal of a Minimum Viable Product (MVP)?
options: Test an idea quickly with minimal effort
Write the longest possible feature list
